website_summaries.verdict: Made by a well-known brand in health industry with a reputation for accuracy and precision with readings. Great low-admin option.
pros: Utilizes No Coding technology, so there’s no need to reset the meter with each new box
This eliminates an extra step in testing, making these strips streamlined and user-friendly
It also uses Second Chance technology to apply more blood instead of using extra strips
cons: Only compatible with Bayer’s Contour Next meters
Expensive, even when buying in bulk, which could be problematic to diabetics or seniors on a budget

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: There's something wrong with these strips. They were way off and every time I tested I always got a very high unusual number. I finally (using insurance) paid for contour next test strips, through a credible pharmacy, and my numbers were normal and in range. If you plan on using these strips I would definitely be cautious, especially if you test to determine how much insulin you're getting!!
customer_reviews.author: Smoreo

customer_reviews.title: Labeled for Medicare/Medicaid only
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes a low price really is too good to be true. These test strips sold by DHS Med are indeed Contour Next strips, and I have found them to be accurate. But the boxes are labeled, in that yellow panel you see on one side, "For use by Medicare/Medicaid recipients only." This makes me wonder how the seller got hold of the strips and whether they are selling them to the general public legally. As it happens I am on Medicare, but they didn't ask me about that before I ordered. This may or may not be a concern for you. Just don't be surprised by this label.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Not happy buying product obtained by Medicare fraud.
customer_reviews.text: I get the order and there is a large yellow and red label that reads, "FOR USE BY Medicare / Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY". So they were obtained by Medicare fraud. If that is not sketchy enough for you, the results I get with these strips are much higher than what I usually get. I won't order any more from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Sieglitz

customer_reviews.title: For Medicare/Medicare beneficiaries ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that the product says "FOR USE BY Medicare/Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY". I read the reviews and noticed this was an issue but I assumed that the problem had been corrected. I will not be buying this product again. I am very disappointed that Amazon is keeping this product listed under this description. Please be aware before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Nevets

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Both boxes of strips turned out to be bad and had to throw them out. They were measuring 30-40 points high after comparing to another set of strips and varied wildly. I had good luck with the same strips that came with the glucose monitor. Never again. A big waste of money and could have died if the value was not so far off of I could not trust it. I could have died of hypoglycemia. The strips were not expired. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Charles Hines

customer_reviews.title: They were NOT Contour Next Strips
customer_reviews.text: They were sold as Contour Next Strips but they are not! They didn't work with the Next meter. You are unable to return them so you are out your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cameron

customer_reviews.title: The readings were so bad, 40-50 points off from my old meter
customer_reviews.text: Don't use anymore. The readings were so bad, 40-50 points off from my old meter. If I was on shots I would have been in the hospital. I know they were off by that amount because I had a box of old strips and I tested both at the same time. Went to an Accu Chek, it's a LITTE better only off by 20-30 points, so I just deduct that from the reading. I know I'm right to deduct that amount because my A1C has remained the same. Wish I had my old meter, but the strips were discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: KATHYE

customer_reviews.title: Poor service and quality. Beware DHS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered test strips 7/12/18. I received them 8/6/18. The strips are not the same as my old ones. They say Contour Next not Bayer as my old strips. Box says for Medicare/Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY. Not sure where DHS got these strips? They tested 7 points higher than my old strips. DHS , poor service, poor quality. Beware of DHS !!
customer_reviews.author: lessteel

customer_reviews.title: Like the servicde and the price, wish for better accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: The supplier always delivers ahead of schedule. Good on them. But I am a bit disappointed with the Contour next accuracy (repeatability). Even with thorough hand washing and IPA swabbing I am getting repeatability variations of more than +/- 10 mg/dl (sigma = 7). Compare that to the reference that has a sigma of 1.5. I can tell if the peak is over 200 or under 150. But is a fasting reading of 100 really a normal 90 or an elevated 110? (I know - be thankful that the level is low enough to be in the noise. Life could be much worse)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent seller, Amazon currently investigating, product defective
customer_reviews.text: Fraudulently obtained products being sold. Clearly states on boxes "For Medicare/Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY". I reported this to Amazon today since they are recommending this seller and they are looking into it. I also was refunded in full by Amazon due to this product being completely fraudulently sold by the seller. Strips also read highly off compared to 2 other meters, very dangerous. DO NOT SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.author: StevieN

customer_reviews.title: Shame on you!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all! I ordered the Contour NEXT and i got this.. these strips will NOT fit my machine. Very disappointed that its not eligible for return either.. im assuming someone just grabbed the box off the shelf and didnt even look to make sure they were the right ones... now im out the money and have NO Contour NEXT strips that i desperately need for my diabetes because someone couldn't do there job correctly.. seriously, you guys had one job..
customer_reviews.author: Misty Mckay

customer_reviews.title: These strips do not give an accurate result.
customer_reviews.text: These strips do not give an accurate result. They measure at least 25 points too high compared to the ones I received with my meter. Also they are marked for Medicare/Medicaid beneficiaries only.
customer_reviews.author: P. H.

customer_reviews.title: Fair, Reasonably Priced
customer_reviews.text: My husband is diabetic and ran out of these blood glucose test strips. He went to Walgreen’s to buy a box and the price was $75 for ONE BOX. That’s highway robbery! I looked here on Amazon and got TWO boxes for $40 total. It’s a crime for Walgreen’s to charge that much for a necessary medical supply that’s not covered by insurance. Thanks, Amazon, for a fair, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Not For Resale Items!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I receive ten packs with ten strips in each pack of "Not for Resale"? Dont sell or list the item as two packs of fifty strips each and send "Not for Resale" items. Just bad business practice not being truthful from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: MyEzStore

customer_reviews.title: Box says "For Use by Medicare/Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY".  Why is that?
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy these again. I don't understand why that notice is on the box but something just doesn't feel right. The readings I get are also strange. Taking samples a minute apart can give a 15 point or more different reading.
customer_reviews.author: L. Holzwarth

customer_reviews.title: MEDICARE / MEDICADE FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: I will be writing my Congressman asking him to investigate how Amazon is selling products label for Medicare / Medicare recipients only. I suggest if you have boxes labeled that way, you do likewise.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you are sensitive to scents!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work as they should, however when I opened the shipping mailer, I was assaulted by the overwhelming scent of a nasty air freshner. When I pulled the strips out, they are packaged together in shrink wrap that is COATED in a greasy, flowery scented substance. To top off the experience, as seen in my photo, these strips are meant for Medicare/Medicaid recipients. I won't speculate here what happened, I'm sure some can figure it out for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for a few years. It is reliable. The last time I purchased, the boxes say these can only be purchased through Medicare or Medicaid. I believe someone is committing fraud. I won't be purchasing from here again.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for years
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed as a type II diabetic back in 2005. My PCP had me try many of the new diabetes medications as they rolled out along with various different monitoring systems. When I discovered the Bayer Next system I became a big fan of this system in a few days, and I remain one still over a decade later. The convenience of this system, and it's proven accuracy will be why I will continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: George Wooden

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: Item description depicts 2 boxes of 50. Received 10 boxes of 10 with each box clearly labeled, "NOT FOR RESALE". THIS IS FRAUD. And Amazon won't allow returns. Photos will be published.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Errors every time. Defective. PB Trading sent me these and none will work without an error code. What a waste. The box states FOR USE BY Medicare/Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when products that can expire are sold below current market value, you immediately think that they are close to the expiration date. These had 18 months before expiring (normal). The first vial tested good. So this was a great purchase. This purchase was about 17% below what I have been paying on amazon and 70% below my local pharmacy rate WITH insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price  Current Product ( Expiration date is 05-31-2021)
customer_reviews.text: Although the price has risen for these strips on Amazon in the last 6 months the price still beats local pharmacies and discount super centers. Expiration date is 05-31-2021. Basically year to use them. They work well with my Contour Next One Meter. They do have an advisory that "FOR USE BY Medicare / Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY". Not a problem since I am one of those beneficiaries.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Anywhere from 30 to 60 points higher than OneTouch
customer_reviews.text: Anywhere from 30 to 60 points higher than OneTouch. And it's this batch of strips. I have used Contour before and they usually within 10 points of a OneTouch. These strips are bad. Update: I spoke too soon. These strips are consistent. I purchased another box of the same at Wal-Mart to compare with, and these too, were consistently 30 points above what a OneTouch reads. I will finish all four boxes before giving my final review.
customer_reviews.author: Mango-Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Less Expense than CVS
customer_reviews.text: Pump user need to test minimum 4 times daily that’s on a good day. Medicare will only fill 300 strips leaving me to pay out my pocket for the additional strips. CVS stated I would have to pay 1000 for the amount that Doctor prescribed even though I have secondary insurance policy
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: MEDICARE/MEDICAID FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box that was clearly labeled for Medicare or Medicaid recipients only. Why is amazon still allowing this product to be sold on their site? Very disappointed. This listing is fraudulent and taking resources from those who truly need it :(
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and accurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Have been using this for years. Expiration date I received has about a year and in half left. Pricing changes frequently, so you have to keep an eye out for the best price. Overall, I highly recommend. You can also use model 7809 which is the same as this 7808.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 100 Bayer Contour Next Blood Glucose Test Strips for my meter. I tried 1 of them and it was very accurate! They arrived when I expected them. Great strips, and a very good price! They won't expire until spring of 2022 which is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Loleta S.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much for sending me order on time. I greatly appreciated. I will definetly continue buying this item often.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Oquendo

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy not proven yet... But looks pretty spot on
customer_reviews.text: I believe them to be very accurate. My blood sugar was a little high last time I went to the doctor. I have been working on my diet and it shows it should be slowly going down so I won't know the accuracy results until the next time I see my doctor. But I it's a good scale anyway. I'm just pre-diabetic working to keep it that way.
customer_reviews.author: T Green

customer_reviews.title: Saving a diabetic money.
customer_reviews.text: Buying these strips on Amazon saves me any where from 30 to 50 USD per purchase. Even with my insurance. I’ll always highly rate sellers who can get me diabetes related items cheaper than any healthcare provider. These test strips are not expired and are legitimate Contour test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hass

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective when just 25 of these can go for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective when just 25 of these can go for approximately $40 dollars or more. Also, these don't expire until next year. If you have family or friends that have diabetes or want to monitor their blood glucose and that the strips cost too much, then these may be the right price for them. Three times a day will last for 3 months for them to monitor their blood glucose
customer_reviews.author: Eitoku

customer_reviews.title: Labeled for Medicare/Medicaid only
customer_reviews.text: The yellow box at the top of the left side of the box is where they blocked out "FOR USE BY Medicare / Medicaid Beneficiaries ONLY"
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: At least 1/4 the cost of my pharmacy.
customer_reviews.text: My pharmacy charged me $144 for a box of 100. That's when I went looking online and found these for a fraction of the cost. This is not on a my favorite testers as it reads as an error a good precentage of the time. I will problem buy a different lancet next time but for now will use these strips.
customer_reviews.author: Kharysma

customer_reviews.title: Check the seller for reviews strips errors not working because used
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 100 strips half or them received an error code from the meter they had been used and not working
customer_reviews.author: c0deName_ZERO

customer_reviews.title: How do you rate this?
customer_reviews.text: How do you rate glucose test strips? I have no idea if they are accurate. Ease of use depends on your monitor, not the strips. Value for money -- well, everything about diabetes is over priced.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Legit strips.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Legit strips. Works the way they are suppose to. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Desilu118

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is branded as Contour , doesn't mean it will work in your machine. I bought for my dad . unfortunately none of them work. the machine is fine because , we bought a box from cvs and it works fine. too bad my dad left and went back home the next day. they don't accept return which i kinda understand. so it was a loss for me . sadly. again read and read before you buy this .
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad to be able to get these here. My insurance won't pay for testing strips, so I get these here at a much reduced cost. I typically buy my needles and my alchohol pads at Wal-Mart using their budget brand that they carry. These strips seem to work and give me the most accurate readings though. Can't go wrong with Bayer.
customer_reviews.author: Zadees

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, economical, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Abour half the cost of drugstore with insurance. I have purchased these from this seller several times and never had a problem with accuracy. Always have quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Readings Glucose Test Strips
customer_reviews.text: Test strips in a retail store are priced too high for a senior citizen. I have been purchasing my strips for about 3-4 yrs from Amazon and I feel I'm getting accurate readings and I like the home delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: mike maguire

customer_reviews.title: incompatible! unretunable!
customer_reviews.text: this meter and test strips are not compatible with Contour Next meterrs or next test strips. The product listing does not mention this nor does it mention this kit is not returnable. In my humble opinion, that is deceptive marketing. Furthermore, the Ascencia help desk agent informed me that Amazon is not an authorized distributor of this product. 24 dollars wasted
customer_reviews.author: Renee S.

customer_reviews.title: " Sort of like when you set your clock ahead of actual time ...
customer_reviews.text: The Bayer contour meter and strips seem to measure levels a bit high. I have another, more accurate glucometer with cheaper testing strips...but I use this one since it is more "pessimistic." Sort of like when you set your clock ahead of actual time to keep ahead of schedule. So, if you like absolute precision, this isn't the meter/strips you need. And, the testing strips are about 30% higher than the competing Easy Touch. And, as always, the ultimate arbiter of blood sugar levels is our A1C...these meters are just estimators and reflect trends; not our actual blood sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Illegal goods. Only for medicare/medicaid beneficiaries marked on box
customer_reviews.text: I believe this sale is illegal. Only for medicare/medicaid beneficiaries marked on box
customer_reviews.author: Peter H. Gien

customer_reviews.title: Online low-cost test strips
customer_reviews.text: These are far lower cost on Amazon than at the pharmacies. I chose Contour Next because of how much cheaper these strips are online over other glucose meters. I'm glad that I did. Very pleased with the cost and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Miraenda

customer_reviews.title: Works well for glucose checking
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for about five months now seems pretty accurate easy to use the only thing is they are a little pricey but I think they're worth it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and affordable
customer_reviews.text: As a newly diagnosed diabetic, my husband needed strips that we could afford but that would also be accurate. These have been a lifesaver, literally. They test accurate and are much much cheaper than any other strips available.
customer_reviews.author: PurplePineapple

customer_reviews.title: same as ones prescribed by doctor
customer_reviews.text: These are the same strips I had a prescription for from the doctor. Only could get 30 day supply from doc, so found these and this is the 2nd order. Is the same as what is prescribed.
customer_reviews.author: wheelholder

customer_reviews.title: Works with the meter
customer_reviews.text: Quite some time ago I bought the meter and kept in the car as a backup glucose tester for when on trips. Quite often we forget our regular testers at home. Was very glad to find the test strips when we ran out.. Got them quickly and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for carrying these! Love that I can easily order when I’m getting low and they come within a day or two. Accurate and well priced compared to those in store. One less thing to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: These may be inexpensive but the meter/strips are garbage. They read, consistenly, about 30 points higher than the more expensive unit I have. If I relied on these then I'd think I my blood sugar was ALWAYS too high.
customer_reviews.author: R. Maxwell Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work as they should. They are cheaper here over buying in the store. I’ve made multiple purchases. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: This is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: Found out about this product availability on amazon through a friend and I'm so lucky I did! This is very cheap, it just works as well as the ones you can get in the store on a fraction of the cost. Amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jack-the-Bichon

customer_reviews.title: Sent the contour strips, not contour NEXT strips - deceitful advertising
customer_reviews.text: Contour Next strips were advertised, but plain Contour strips were sent (which are NOT compatible with Contour Next devices)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Washabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Tracking my missing package
customer_reviews.text: Apologies are due to you . I had reported order for Contor next blood glucose Strips were not deliver today . I just found your package that was placed in my mail box ... Wind had blown out of mailbox to bushes next to house . I raked leaves up there & found my package so I apologize .
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne W.

customer_reviews.title: They are okay
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t gage it’s accuracy because I honestly don’t know. It’s better than the others I’ve been using. The jury is still out. Hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra from Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest glucose test I have ever used and requires minimal amount of blood. I am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Several duds
customer_reviews.text: I would say only about 2/3rds have actually worked the others gave me errors. Perhaps it is my device so I can't judge.
customer_reviews.author: Rick101

customer_reviews.title: Contour is my choice for test strips
customer_reviews.text: One of the lower cost systems out there, and this size of test strips lasts me just right. Have ordered thrice, and each time the product arrives within a few days. Expiration dates always far enough out. I've typically check a new strip with one from the prior lot, and sometimes vs. a OneTouch (prior $$ system). Never had any reading more than 8 points from another...and that's close enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Small sample, fast to wick blood - just great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a Contour Next USB, and ordered these strips to go with it. Bayer got my control solution to me in 2 days, I did thecontrol test (easy as pie) and then tried a test on me. Let me tell you, these strips rock! They use a tiny sample of blood and wick it up the strip super fast. Worked perfectly with the monitor. After my last two monitors and strips that used much more blood and didn't draw it up as fast, these are sooo much better. I'm a happy camper :)
customer_reviews.author: patticake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Been using for over a year now with no intension to stop unless something better comes along
customer_reviews.author: Telford/ Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ones
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if there was a clear distinction between these and the other contour strips. $40 mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: These strips are defective. I attempted to use 4 of them and every one gave me an "error" reading. Returning them is not offered as an option, so total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and reliable strips!!
customer_reviews.text: A must and great that you carry them-fair price and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Koegler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Contour Next glucometer test strips at good value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased many of these already and will be back for more. A great seller. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jumbo Gym

customer_reviews.title: ITem not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: ITem shows 2 containers of 50 strips each. What I got was 10 containers of tent strips - in other words only strips,,
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Necessary item that works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fast. These test strips are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as the drug store, much cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: That's the whole review: Same as the drugstore Bayer Contours, and much cheaper (about half) I compared them to the ones form the drugstore and the readings were the same, so these aren't rejects or out of date.
customer_reviews.author: Biggreydog

customer_reviews.title: Very fair priced product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product quarter of what my insurance company would pay. I just paid out of pocket and very happy with everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: HVAC MAN

customer_reviews.title: Functioning satisfactorily with my new meter.
customer_reviews.text: These test strips function fine in my new Contour Next USB meter. I like the firm snap closure on the lid of the container. It DOES seem to me that they need a little less blood than the earlier model strips, and supposedly you can add blood if you have insufficient the first time, but I have not tested this operating mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Whelan

customer_reviews.title: fast service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast service very fast. Will order from you all again!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Do not like
customer_reviews.text: These are the first test strips to use, too small.
customer_reviews.author: tamrock59

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing these for years now, and they are great! Better price/value than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glucose Analysis at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Contour Next is one of the most accurate systems. Depend on it. Strips are fairly priced
customer_reviews.author: rellimmelc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these!! Took forever to receive and strips are not accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Wind Song

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: I was just happy to be able to acquire the strips for my Contour Next plus at a very reasonable price. I checked several locations, almost thought I needed to get a new glucose meter just because I couldn’t find test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Bjdono

customer_reviews.title: Late and no returns! Read the description throughly!
customer_reviews.text: Not only was it not fulfilled within the two day prime shipping as promised, but is not eligible for returns. Doctor changed to a continuous glucose monitor and now I don’t need!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good test for blood sugar
customer_reviews.text: Good test strips, quick delivey. Bad thing is they went up on the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious this product is intended for Medicare / Medicaid patients
customer_reviews.text: Product was for Medicaid/Medicare recipients. It is also off brand not Bauer.
customer_reviews.author: geosq2000

customer_reviews.title: Great Strips
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my wife, who is diabetic. She said they work great and are priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: None of the strips work. Unable to return.
customer_reviews.text: Checked 15 strips at random. None of them work. Went to the Pharmacy to check. - looks like this is a non returnable item. Well. What shall we do ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two pack and didn’t deliver
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pack for my old man and it didn’t deliver
customer_reviews.author: Kashi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Buying on Amazon is a great deal for my wife who has to check her blood sugar several (several) times a day. This saves us a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Contour-Next Bayer Blood Glucose Test Strips, 100 Count
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Easy convent way to order diabetic management items.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Missing a box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packs of 100 test strips, which should come in a total of 4 boxes, with 50 per box. However, I only received 3 of the boxes. Not only that, but the little baggie that is missing one is open? It looks like it was possibly taken out before packing for shipment or fell out somewhere in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Do exactly what they are supposed to do, cheaper than from the pharmacy. Win-win
customer_reviews.author: Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Really love these
customer_reviews.text: I have a diabetic cat who needs her BGL tested several times a day before giving her insulin. The strips are affordable and work with a very small amount of blood, which is great since I have to lance her paw pad for blood. I've tried a couple of other BGL monitors and strips but the Contout Next that goes with these strips is the best and the fastest.
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Immense gratitude!
customer_reviews.text: As I've commented on the Bayer Contour strips, the same satisfaction applies here. I purchase this brand for a friend in another country because she's unable to afford the things she needs due to financial constraints. I'm more than contented that you not only grant affordability, but, your efficiency and quality in both product and service allows me to both receive and mail them with significant time that prevents her from running out. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Deltobago

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here, product was as advertised and delivered in a reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Epp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the Contour-Next strips require such a small amount of blood, and give such quick results. I also appreciate the low cost for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered quickly & packaged in a safe way. This was a good value for the money. I would order again
customer_reviews.author: joan fagan

customer_reviews.title: another seamless order
customer_reviews.text: product works great and thi supplier does excellent job delivering as promised at fair pricd
customer_reviews.author: spyider

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I’m diabetic & I like these stripes. The only thing is that the price has increased a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Thank heaven for Today'z Dealz!
customer_reviews.text: My husband tests as many as 10 times per day. These strips are a God Send. We are on a fixed income and the savings is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela B.

customer_reviews.title: As Adverstised
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Contour-Next for some time now. The product is exactly what was advertised and the price was way below what my local pharmacy charges. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is above board
customer_reviews.text: Product clearly says “for use by Medicaid/Medicare beneficiaries only”. I am neither. Is this legal?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Goldstone

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: The Contour Next strips are not what I use nor do they work with my Accu Chec Fast Click lancets. I have not opened these strips because i ordered both items together but I reviewed contour next strips. I have re-ordered the Accu Chec Guide strips and would appreciate it if you could refund my account. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Undraye Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best price ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can get these for such an amazing price. Don’t ever buy in stores!
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi Miyazawa

customer_reviews.title: Glad to get these at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get these at a reasonable price, as my insurance doesn't cover the Contour Next meter. These strips are brand new and work perfectly. Thanks for offering this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable test strips
customer_reviews.text: These have a year expiration date, they're exactly what they say they are. Very reliable and and a great value for the price. I'd buy them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: John
